text: Letter dated 30 May 2017 from the President of the Security Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 25 May 2017 (S/2017/462) concerning your intention to appoint Horst KÃ¶hler (Germany) to serve as your Personal Envoy for Western Sahara has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the intention expressed in your letter.
